description:
It was discovered that Jhead did not properly handle certain crafted images
while processing the Exif markers. An attacker could possibly use this
issue to crash Jhead, resulting in a denial of service.

jhead.description: Manipulate the non-image part of Exif compliant JPEG files
Manipulate the non-image part of Exif compliant JPEG files

title: Jhead vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Jhead could be made to crash if it opened a specially crafted
file.
